faqs.question: How do I adopt a horse?
faqs.answer: You can adopt a horse by contacting us through our website or by calling our rescue center.

faqs.question: What is the cost of adoption?
faqs.answer: Adoption fees vary depending on the horse, but typically range between $500 and $1,500.

faqs.question: How can I volunteer?
faqs.answer: You can volunteer by filling out our volunteer form on the website and attending an orientation session.
